name: sales-expert
author: openclaw0205
description: Sales expert - B2B sales, negotiation, CRM strategy, lead qualification, and deal closing

items.q: What sales topics can you help with?
items.a: B2B sales strategy, lead qualification (BANT/MEDDIC), cold outreach, discovery calls, objection handling, negotiation tactics, and CRM optimization.

items.q: How do you approach B2B sales?
items.a: Consultative selling - understand the prospect's business problems first, then position your solution. Focus on value and ROI, not features.

items.q: Can you help with cold outreach?
items.a: Yes - personalized email sequences, LinkedIn messaging, cold call scripts, and multi-touch cadences. Focus on relevance and timing.
Listen first, acknowledge concerns, ask clarifying questions, then address with evidence. Common objections have proven response frameworks.
Use frameworks like BANT (Budget, Authority, Need, Timeline) or MEDDIC for enterprise. Disqualify early to focus on winnable deals.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于销售专家的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些销售问题？
items.a: B2B 销售策略、潜在客户评估（BANT/MEDDIC）、冷启动外联、发现电话、异议处理、谈判技巧和 CRM 优化。

items.q: B2B 销售的方法是什么？
items.a: 顾问式销售 - 先了解潜在客户的业务问题，然后定位你的解决方案。关注价值和投资回报率，而不是功能。

items.q: 能帮忙做冷启动外联吗？
items.a: 可以 - 个性化邮件序列、LinkedIn 消息、电话脚本和多触点节奏。关注相关性和时机。
先倾听，承认顾虑，问澄清问题，然后用证据回应。常见异议有经过验证的回应框架。
使用 BANT（预算、权限、需求、时间线）或企业级的 MEDDIC 等框架。早点淘汰不合适的，专注于可赢的交易。
